power.title: Gloom Thief
power.fluff: As you slash your foe, you seize a part of its shadow, which you use to hide yourself from your enemies' eyes
power.section: The gloom distance is a number of squares equal to to 1 + the number of your shrouds on the target.
If you were hidden when you used this attack, you can make a Stealth check to remain hidden, though you take a -10 penalty to the check as if you were running.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: The gloom distance is a number of squares equal to one-half the number of your shrounds on the target (minimum 1 square, adjacent).

power.section: true Effect:Until the end of your next turn, you are invisible while within within the gloom distance of the target.

power.title: Nightmare Shades
power.fluff: The darkness in the corner of your foe's eyes shifts and moves, causing it to glance about in terror that causes it to forget the true threat to its life

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d8 + Dexterity modifier psychic damage, and the target grants combat advantage to you until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of your next turn, you gain a power bonus to damage rolls against the target equal to the number of your shrouds on it.

section.name: Night Stalker:
section.text: While you have this bonus, the target also counts as being adjacent to none of your enemies for the purposes of your additional damage.

power.title: Shadow Darts
power.fluff: You launch a volley of chilling darts made of shadow energy at your foe

section.text: Make three attack rolls and resolve them as a single hit, the power only counts as missing if all of them miss, and counts as a critical hit if at least one of them is a critical

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1d4 + Dexterity modifier cold damage if one attack hits, 2d4 + Dexterity modifier cold damage if two attack rolls hit, or 3d4 + Dexterity modifier cold damage if three attacks hit.

power.title: Smothering Shadow
power.fluff: You stab at your foe and channel shadow energy into its body, causing its own shadow to become so heavy to be a hindrance

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target is slowed until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Bleak Disciple:
section.text: While slowed, the target also counts as being nonbloodied for the purposes of your additional damage. If it is already nonbloodied, it counts as being at full hit points instead.
